headline.main: NY Attorney General Wields Powerful Weapon in Exxon Climate Case
headline.print_headline: NY Attorney General Wields Powerful Weapon in Exxon Climate Case

docs.snippet: A near century-old statute that gives New York state prosecutors unusually broad authority to prosecute securities fraud could prove a powerful weapon as Attorney General Eric Schneiderman probes Exxon Mobil Corp over whether the oil firm mislead ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A near century-old statute that gives New York state prosecutors unusually broad authority to prosecute securities fraud could prove a powerful weapon as Attorney General Eric Schneiderman probes Exxon Mobil Corp over whether the oil firm mislead the public and shareholders about the perils of climate change.

headline.main: Swiss Canton Eyes Scrapping German-Language Requirement for Wealthy Foreigners
headline.print_headline: Swiss Canton Eyes Scrapping German-Language Requirement for Wealthy Foreigners

docs.snippet: Lawmakers in the Swiss canton where fugitive trader Marc Rich took refuge and which Glencore calls home may try to ease the path to permanent residency for some foreigners by scrapping a German language requirement - as long as they've got enough ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Lawmakers in the Swiss canton where fugitive trader Marc Rich took refuge and which Glencore calls home may try to ease the path to permanent residency for some foreigners by scrapping a German language requirement - as long as they've got enough money.

headline.main: Mexico Blasts U.S. for Not Filing Charges in Border Patrol Death
headline.print_headline: Mexico Blasts U.S. for Not Filing Charges in Border Patrol Death

docs.snippet: Mexico on Friday voiced its "most energetic rejection" of the decision by U.S. authorities to not press charges against border patrol agents suspected of killing a Mexican national near a California border crossing in 2010....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexico on Friday voiced its "most energetic rejection" of the decision by U.S. authorities to not press charges against border patrol agents suspected of killing a Mexican national near a California border crossing in 2010.

headline.main: Castro Strikes Back for Four-Shot Lead at Rain-Hit PGA Event
headline.print_headline: Castro Strikes Back for Four-Shot Lead at Rain-Hit PGA Event

docs.snippet: Roberto Castro was stung by a bee at the fifth hole but an eagle three holes later eased his pain as he vaulted to a four-shot lead on Friday at the weather-hit Sanderson Farms Championship in Mississippi....
docs.lead_paragraph: Roberto Castro was stung by a bee at the fifth hole but an eagle three holes later eased his pain as he vaulted to a four-shot lead on Friday at the weather-hit Sanderson Farms Championship in Mississippi.

headline.main: Ex-NFL QB McNabb to Serve 18 Days in an Arizona Jail for DUI
headline.print_headline: Ex-NFL QB McNabb to Serve 18 Days in an Arizona Jail for DUI

docs.snippet: Former NFL quarterback Donovan McNabb will serve 18 days in an Arizona jail after pleaded guilty to a non-extreme DUI....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former NFL quarterback Donovan McNabb will serve 18 days in an Arizona jail after pleaded guilty to a non-extreme DUI.

headline.main: Over 100 Bodies Dumped in Mass Grave by Mexican Security Forces: Officials
headline.print_headline: Over 100 Bodies Dumped in Mass Grave by Mexican Security Forces: Officials

docs.snippet: Mexican authorities are investigating local security officials who put at least 105 unidentified victims of violent crime in a mass grave in central Mexico, officials said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mexican authorities are investigating local security officials who put at least 105 unidentified victims of violent crime in a mass grave in central Mexico, officials said on Friday.

headline.main: Arizona Memorial Reopened After Engineers Say Dock Is Safe
headline.print_headline: Arizona Memorial Reopened After Engineers Say Dock Is Safe

docs.snippet: The National Park Service is reopening the USS Arizona Memorial to visitors after engineers determined its dock is safe....
docs.lead_paragraph: The National Park Service is reopening the USS Arizona Memorial to visitors after engineers determined its dock is safe.

headline.main: Connecticut Pension Report to Advise Trimming Return Outlook
headline.print_headline: Connecticut Pension Report to Advise Trimming Return Outlook

docs.snippet: A report expected next week on reforming Connecticut's state employee public pension system will recommend cutting the annual expected rate of return by 1 percentage point to 7 percent, a lead researcher told Reuters on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A report expected next week on reforming Connecticut's state employee public pension system will recommend cutting the annual expected rate of return by 1 percentage point to 7 percent, a lead researcher told Reuters on Friday.

headline.main: Liselotte Neumann, Wendy Doolan Share Legends Tour Lead
headline.print_headline: Liselotte Neumann, Wendy Doolan Share Legends Tour Lead

docs.snippet: Liselotte Neumann and Wendy Doolan shared the lead at 4-under 68 on Friday in the Legends Tour's Walgreens Charity Championship....
docs.lead_paragraph: Liselotte Neumann and Wendy Doolan shared the lead at 4-under 68 on Friday in the Legends Tour's Walgreens Charity Championship.
